Name: 7_drowning_supervision_costs_pools
Representative_Docs: ['new type of system can recognize an involuntary submersion of humans at the water surface which means before the drowning accident happens', 'in open water economic benefits the systems provide economic advantages as pool operators can reduce staff costs without reducing the safety level drowning related costs can be reduced personal benefits the systems can promote physical and psychological health and well-being humans of all ages can be protected from death or lifelong disability the burden for families of drowning victims especially children can be diminished mental stress for the swimming supervision staff as the consequence of experiencing mortal accident can be reduced staff are skilled to work with ai based systems societal benefits drowning prevention is an important contribution to public health worldwide the social costs for drowning can be reduced swimming and bathing are safer for all social groups table a.4 continued table a.4 continued impact positive impacts reducing staff costs for pool operators reducing costs for health insurances keeping pools open despite lack of staff improvement of public health negative impacts the system can lull the staff into false sense of security and can lead to reduced attention problems with data protection authorities a.6 beneficial ai system use case ai for energy efficiency and reduced energy consumption in information and communication technologies ict energy consumption and the greenhouse gas ghg emissions tied to it play an important role in terms of environmental impact', 'functional benefits the systems enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of water related su- pervision by these factors recognition of the possibility of drowning accident means an early alert to the staff respiratory impairment has not taken place in this early stage of drowning and there is more time for early rescue measures systems are also suitable for bathing water with high turbidity e.g']

Name: 11_data_trustworthiness_transparency_privacy
Representative_Docs: ['there are many factors that contribute to the trustworthiness of an ai system see iso/iec tr including explainability robustness transparency ethical alignment and data quality considerations', 'the system ensures that video data are not connected with personal data and are stored securely not longer than defined time controllability certain system adjustments are allowed for the qualified staff of the user ethical alignment the system performs its results independent from any bias factors and provides safety to all humans compliance to legal requirements and other data considerations the systems applies to all legal and normative requirements and especially to all data protection regulations value economic societal etc', 'the following requirements are fulfilled by the systems explainability training about the function of the system and its intention is provided to the staff to ensure proper use of the system transparency information about the basic functions of the system is given to the pool users and bathers for better understanding of the cameras and affected staff robustness the producer/provider ensures that the system will work under all operational conditions especially at high bather load reliability trustworthiness the producer/provider ensures that the training data are sufficient and the system provides the required results with constant quality maintenance of privacy camera based systems very often are problem for data protection authorities']

Name: 16_pathologist_learning_slide_auc
Representative_Docs: ['the winning team reported to evaluate the top-ranking deep learning systems against human pathologist the camelyon16 organizers had pathologist examine the test images used in the competition', 'a.3 beneficial ai system use case deep learning for identifying metastatic breast cancer the international symposium on biomedical imaging isbi held grand challenge to evaluate computational systems for the automated detection of metastatic breast cancer in whole slide images of sentinel lymph node biopsies', 'when the predictions of our deep learning system were combined with the predictions of the human pathologist the auc was raised to 0,9948 reﬂecting drop in the error rate to 0,52 percent']
